text: Ej ummati Muhammad, ojo ʙa sumo narasidaast xaʙari kasone, ki pes az sumo ʙudaand, cun qavmi Nuh va Od va Samud va niz kasone, ki ʙa'd az onho ʙudaand? Cuz Alloh kasero az onon ogohi nest. Pajomʙaronason hamroh ʙo dalelhoi ravsan omadand va onho dast ʙar dahon ʙurdandu az nihojati taaccuʙ va inkor angustoni xudro gazidand, guftand: «Mo ʙa on ci ʙa on amr sudaed, imon nameovarem va dar cize, ki moro ʙa on mexoned, saxt dar suʙha hastem»
